title: How to Invite All Friends on Facebook

steps.title: Open the Invite All Friends on Facebook extension in Google Chrome.
steps.content: Open the Invite All Friends on Facebook extension in Google Chrome. You must be signed into Chrome to install the extension. If you see a silhouette icon in the upper-right corner of the browser window, rather than your first initial or Google+ profile pic, click on the icon and then click on Sign In .

steps.title: Click on Add to Chrome.
steps.content: Click on Add to Chrome . It's in the upper-right corner of the window. Doing so installs the extension into your Chrome browser.

steps.title: Click on the Facebook logo.
steps.content: Click on the Facebook logo. It's left of the search bar at the top of the window.

steps.title: Click on Events.
steps.content: Click on Events . It's on the left side of the window, under "Explore."

steps.title: Click on +Create Event.
steps.content: Click on +Create Event . It's in the right-center of the window.

steps.title: Click on Create Private Event.
steps.content: Click on Create Private Event . It's the first option in the drop-down menu. Only invited guests can see private events. Public events are open to everyone on Facebook and do not use invitations.

steps.title: Enter the details for your event.
steps.content: Enter the details for your event. Include the time, place, and a title for your event. You can also allow your friends to invite friends by checking a box on the bottom of this page.

steps.title: Click on Create Private Event.
steps.content: Click on Create Private Event . It's in the lower-right corner of the dialog box.

steps.title: Click on Invite.
steps.content: Click on Invite . It's a drop-down menu on the right side of the window.

steps.title: Click on All Friends.
steps.content: Click on All Friends . It's on the left side of the dialog box. There is no "select all" function for your "All Friends" list.

steps.title: Select a few friends.
steps.content: Select a few friends. Click on the buttons next to three or four friends' names, and then deselect them.

steps.title: Click on ✔️.
steps.content: Click on ✔️ . It's the logo for the extension and appears on the right side of the search bar at the top of the Chrome window. The extension will select all of the friends (up to 500) on your list. Facebook currently limits the number of invites per event to 500 to prevent spamming.

steps.title: Click on Send Invites.
steps.content: Click on Send Invites . It's in the lower right corner of the dialog box. This sends the invitations to your friends.
